mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `time_record` (`did`, `start_time`, `end_time`, `total`, `valid`, `create_time`, `create_name`, `update_time`, `update_name`) VALUES
(#{item.did}, DATE_FORMAT(#{item.startTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"), DATE_FORMAT(#{item.endTime},"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s"),#{item.total} ,1, NOW(), #{item.createName}, NOW(),#{item.updateName})
